knimeNode.name: Binary Objects to Files
knimeNode.shortDescription: Write the binary objects of a table as files.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes the files of a table with binary objects. It will append the locations of the files to the output table.
fullDescription.option: The directory where the files will be put

From column
The names can be found in a column of the input table.
Generate
The names will be generated using a pattern.
The column where the filenames can be found
The pattern that will be used to generate the filenames. The ? will be replaced by the index of the corresponding row.

Specifies the behavior when one of the files already exists.
Overwrite
Overwrite the existing column.
Abort
The nodes execution will be aborted.

ports.inPort: Table that contains the binary objects that will be written. Filenames for the output files can also be used, if the are available in the table.
ports.outPort: Input table with the location and URL for each file.
